buildingsData.name: Farm
buildingsData.flavorText: Nestled amidst open fields, the farm is a lifeline for the town, producing fresh crops and bringing families together in shared labor and celebration of the land.

buildingsData.name: Inn
buildingsData.flavorText: A haven for locals and travellers alike, the inn stands as a cornerstone of the community, a place where the weary find respite and the curious find intrigue.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Dice Set, Playing Cards Set);

buildingsData.name: Barracks
buildingsData.flavorText: Inside the barracks, the clamor of armor and weapons is constant, a reassuring sound for some and a reminder of authority's ever-watchful presence for others.

buildingsData.name: Smithy
buildingsData.flavorText: Billowing smoke and glowing embers mark the heart of the smithy, where metal meets fire to create everything from horseshoes to blades.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Smith's Tools); +1 bonus to skill checks using Smith's Tools while in the smithy;

buildingsData.name: Brothel
buildingsData.flavorText: Whispers of discontent fill the streets as the brothel flourishes, a gilded cage where the powerful indulge while the common folk see their dignity sold one night at a time.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Disguise Kit);

buildingsData.name: Watchtower
buildingsData.flavorText: Perched on high, the watchtower offers a clear view of the horizon, but its cold, unyielding gaze leaves many feeling watched rather than protected.

buildingsData.name: Orphanage
buildingsData.flavorText: A place of refuge for those without families, the orphanage provides care for the town's lost children, though some of the guilds' members bemoan the loss of cheap labor.

buildingsData.name: Monument
buildingsData.flavorText: A symbol of the town's might and wealth, the monument inspires awe in some but frustration in others, who see it as an unnecessary display of vanity.
buildingsData.effectText: +1 bonus to Charisma (Persuasion) and Charisma (Intimidation) checks against nobles and high-ranking officials from other factions.

buildingsData.name: Graveyard
buildingsData.flavorText: The graveyard stands as a solemn reminder of lives past, a quiet place of reflection that fosters unity among the living through shared grief and memory.

buildingsData.name: Library
buildingsData.flavorText: The library stands as a testament to the value of knowledge, where every book and tome represents a step toward a brighter, more enlightened future.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Calligrapher's Supplies); +1 bonus to skill checks using Calligrapher's Supplies while in the library;

buildingsData.name: Sewer System
buildingsData.flavorText: Beneath the town, the newly constructed sewer system flows—a marvel of engineering that improves health and cleanliness, though its hidden depths harbor unseen secrets.

buildingsData.name: School
buildingsData.flavorText: While the school strengthens the community and pushes for progress, it also teaches the value of questioning authority—something not all are eager to see.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Language (Common, Dwarvish, Elven, Giant, Gnomish, Halfling, Orc))

buildingsData.name: Jail
buildingsData.flavorText: Behind its barred windows, the jail holds those who defy the law, its presence a quiet warning to any who might challenge the town's authority.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Thieves' Tools)

buildingsData.name: Stables
buildingsData.flavorText: The stables provide not only shelter for horses but also serve as a hub for the town's mounted forces, ensuring swift responses to any threats.

buildingsData.name: Fighting Pit
buildingsData.flavorText: The fighting pit draws crowds and coin alike, but some fear its focus on bloodsport dulls the town's desire for anything more meaningful.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Pit Fighting & Magical Dueling

buildingsData.name: Dwarven Brewery
buildingsData.flavorText: The air around the Dwarven Brewery is always thick with the smell of brewing ale. It is a place where dwarven tradition meets celebration, its warm hearth a beacon on cold nights.
buildingsData.effectText: Trader (Bugman's Ale) ; Downtime Activity: Training (Brewer's Supplies); +1 bonus to skill checks using Brewer's Supplies while in the brewery;

buildingsData.name: Alchemist's Laboratory
buildingsData.flavorText: A modest workshop of bubbling flasks and pungent fumes, the alchemist's laboratory is a sanctuary for discovery, where one mind's quiet pursuit of knowledge might yield wonders.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Alchemist's Tools); +1 bonus to skill checks using Alchemist's Tools while in the laboratory;

buildingsData.name: Park
buildingsData.flavorText: Amidst the city's bustle, the park offers a serene retreat where nature flourishes and minds find inspiration, though its upkeep demands a toll on the city's coffers.

buildingsData.name: Black Market
buildingsData.flavorText: Hidden behind unmarked doors and veiled glances, the black market thrives in defiance of law and morality, a realm where rare and illicit goods, services, and secrets are only a matter of coin.
buildingsData.effectText: Trader (Illicit goods); (optional) Increase available items for Downtime Activity: Buying a Magic Item by 1d4 but increase purchase price for all offered items 1d4 x 25%

buildingsData.name: Construction Yard
buildingsData.flavorText: A hive of hammering, shouting, and relentless movement, the construction yard turns raw resources into grand visions, though its clamor often drowns out the city's quieter joys.

buildingsData.name: Granary
buildingsData.flavorText: A towering symbol of plenty, the granary secures the fruits of the harvest, ensuring that even in scarcity, no family need go without.

buildingsData.name: Glasshouse
buildingsData.flavorText: From humble drinking vessels to intricate lenses, the Glasshouse provides the city with objects of both utility and exquisite beauty.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Glassblower's Tools); +1 bonus to skill checks using Glassblower's Tools while in the glasshouse;

buildingsData.name: Carpenter's Workshop
buildingsData.flavorText: From dawn to dusk, the hum of saws and the scent of fresh timber define the carpenter's workshop, a place where craftsmanship turns rough wood into everything from simple furniture to the grand beams of the city's halls
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Carpenter's Tools); +1 bonus to skill checks using Carpenter's Tools while in the workshop;

buildingsData.name: Stonemason's Workshop
buildingsData.flavorText: Chisels strike stone with rhythmic precision, echoing through the city as calloused hands carve the foundation of its future.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Mason's Tools); +1 bonus to skill checks using Mason's Tools while in the workshop;

buildingsData.name: Academy
buildingsData.flavorText: Within its halls of thought, scholars question the old ways and craft the new, the academy's influence rippling through the city as it births both wisdom and unrest.
buildingsData.effectText: +1d4 bonus to Downtime Activity: Research checks

buildingsData.name: Pathfinder Society Lodge
buildingsData.flavorText: Within its sturdy walls, the lodge fosters daring ventures and questionable alliances, attracting mercenaries, explorers, and the intrigue that inevitably follows in their wake.
buildingsData.effectText: Adventurers can be hired and sent on missions

buildingsData.name: Goblin Quarters
buildingsData.flavorText: Chaotic, noisy, and endlessly inventive, the goblin quarters overflow with peculiar contraptions and questionable experiments, their ingenuity both a marvel and a menace.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Instrument (Bagpipes, Drum, Horn), Language (Goblin));

buildingsData.name: Botanical Garden
buildingsData.flavorText: Nestled in vibrant greenery, the botanical garden blends nature and science, its carefully tended plants offering rare resources to those who know how to harvest their potential.
buildingsData.effectText: Trader (Herbs); Gold cost of Downtime Activity: Brewing Healing Potions is reduced by 20%

buildingsData.name: Architect's Guild
buildingsData.flavorText: Here, within halls lined with models and plans, architects refine construction methods, making ambitious projects achievable with less effort.

buildingsData.name: Nexus of Binding
buildingsData.flavorText: Built around the Nullstone Monolith, the nexus sacrifices innovation and trade to create a sanctuary impervious to magical intrusion.
buildingsData.effectText: Prevents planar travel in a 10 mile radius sphere. Can be activated and deactivated as an action.

buildingsData.name: Glim's Emporium of Exotic Flavours
buildingsData.flavorText: Glim Billowdwaddle's bustling emporium draws spice merchants and food enthusiasts alike, though its extravagance has stirred resentment among the common folk.
buildingsData.effectText: Trader (Spices);

buildingsData.name: Shrine
buildingsData.flavorText: A small but meaningful landmark, the shrine serves as a gathering place for those who seek comfort in faith and tradition.

buildingsData.name: Temple
buildingsData.flavorText: The temple is more than a place of prayer—it is a cornerstone of the community, where traditions are upheld and the people find unity.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Religious Service

buildingsData.name: Monastery
buildingsData.flavorText: Within these walls, monks devote themselves to prayer and labor, their careful craftsmanship supporting both their faith and the city beyond.
buildingsData.effectText: Trader (Holy Water, Restorative Potions);

buildingsData.name: Cathedral
buildingsData.flavorText: Towering over the city as a fortress of faith, the cathedral is both a place of worship and a symbol of divine protection. Few dare challenge a city under the watchful gaze of its patron deity.
buildingsData.effectText: While the city follows the deity's edicts, the deity grants a realm effect to the city.

buildingsData.name: Engineer's Workshop
buildingsData.flavorText: A noisy, chaotic space where problems are solved with gears, levers, and the occasional explosion. Some see it as the future—others see it as a disaster waiting to happen.
buildingsData.effectText: Trader (gadgets & bombs); Downtime Activity: Training (Tinker's Tools); +1 bonus to skill checks using Tinker's Tools while in the workshop;

buildingsData.name: Airship Dockyard
buildingsData.flavorText: A bustling hub of towering scaffolds and massive mooring lines, the dockyard is where skyships are built, loaded, and launched. Merchants and smugglers alike strike deals beneath the towering hulls, while city officials struggle to keep control of what goes in and out.
buildingsData.effectText: Enables travel and trade via airships.

buildingsData.name: Gallows
buildingsData.flavorText: Few things enforce authority like the sight of a hanging body. The gallows keep the city in line, though the weight of fear dampens ambition and sows unease among the people.

buildingsData.name: Market Square
buildingsData.flavorText: Vendors call out their wares, children weave through the crowds, and deals are struck with firm handshakes. The old ways of trade and barter hold strong in this lively square.
buildingsData.effectText: Trader (basic goods)

buildingsData.name: Training Grounds
buildingsData.flavorText: A place where warriors are made, not through words, but through sweat, bruises, and unwavering discipline.
buildingsData.effectText: Downtime Activity: Training (Weapon)

buildingsData.name: Homeless Shelter
buildingsData.flavorText: A humble sanctuary for the destitute, where kindness outweighs profit, though not without resentment from those who see generosity as wasteful.

buildingsData.name: Courthouse
buildingsData.flavorText: Fair trials, strict rulings—this is where disputes are settled and criminals face judgment. It keeps the city in order, even if it stifles progress.

buildingsData.name: City Walls
buildingsData.flavorText: A city well-defended is a city that endures. The walls ensure safety, though merchants grumble at the restricted flow of goods.
buildingsData.effectText: The city's authority is doubled for defense against sieges.

buildingsData.name: Stocks
buildingsData.flavorText: A relic of old justice—crude, effective, and a stark reminder of the consequences of breaking the law.

effectsData.name: Plentiful Harvest
effectsData.flavorText: The gods have smiled upon the land, blessing it with an extraordinary harvest.

effectsData.name: Trader of Spices
effectsData.flavorText: A caravan of spice merchants has arrived in town, bringing exotic flavors from faraway lands.

effectsData.name: Stonemason's Festival
effectsData.flavorText: Abadar watches over the settlement, ensuring that all construction efforts are swift and successful.

effectsData.name: Meteor Showers
effectsData.flavorText: Flaming stones rain from the heavens, leaving behind fragments of rare and valuable minerals. Merchants and artisans alike scramble to make use of the newfound bounty.

effectsData.name: Plague Outbreak
effectsData.flavorText: Merchants close their doors, families barricade themselves inside, and the sick overwhelm the healers. The city weathers the storm, but not without scars.

effectsData.name: Stormfront
effectsData.flavorText: Dark clouds gather, and fierce winds bring chaos. Markets close, shipments are delayed, and the city's economy falters under nature's fury.

effectsData.name: Heroic Deed
effectsData.flavorText: An act of valor brings the city together, restoring faith in its protectors and fostering a newfound sense of camaraderie.
